DOC.detailed_description: The noble gas xenon use general anesthesia clinical routine . Recent report indicate xenon also use increase performance high-performance sport . The purpose study establish method detect xenon exposure human . In patient undergo surgery xenon anesthesia part routine hospital care , small blood sample ( 3ml ) take anesthesia , anaesthesia 1,2 , 4 , 8 , 16 , 24 , 32 , 40 48 hour anesthesia . These blood sample analyze trace xenon .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Xenonbased anesthesia part routine care Inability give write informed consent Known pregnancy Hemoglobin concentration less 12g/dl
